TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetaChildrenColumn extends System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn

summary.span: 表示一个指示一对多关系的数据库字段。

span.span: Represents a database field that indicates a one-to-many relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 动态数据应用程序中类表示一个指示一个对多关系或父-子关系的数据库字段。In ASP.NET Dynamic Data applications, the class represents a database field that indicates a one-to-many relationship or a parent-child relationship. 类表示一个对多关系的父表中的字段。The class represents the field in the parent table of the one-to-many relationship. 但是，可以通过访问子表对象属性。However, you can access the child table object by using the property. 此外可以通过检索子表中的外键字段属性。You can also retrieve the foreign-key field in the child table by using the property.

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Overview

span.span: Gets an object that represents the child table of the one-to-many relationship.

value.span: 一个表示一对多关系中的子表的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the child table of the one-to-many relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取表示一个对多关系的子表的对象。Use the property to get an object that represents the child table of the one-to-many relationship. 可以使用访问父表属性。You can access the parent table by using the property.

summary.span: 获取一个表示子表中的外键字段的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the foreign-key field in the child table.

value.span: 一个表示子表中的外键字段的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the foreign-key field in the child table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够获取对子表中的字段的引用。The property enables you to get a reference to the field in the child table.

span.span: The row that contains the foreign-key field.

summary.span: 获取子表的列表操作页的路径。

span.span: Gets the path of the list-action page for the child table.

returns.span: 子表的列表操作页的路径。

span.span: The path of the list-action page for the child table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时您想要检索使用指定的行作为父级的子表的列表操作页的方法。Use the method when you want to retrieve the list-action page for the child table using the specified row as a parent. 路径通过将查询字符串值追加到包含外键字段值中指定的 URL 获取`row`参数。The path is obtained by appending a query-string value to the URL that contains the foreign-key field value specified in the `row` parameter. 使用方法是调用相同方法并传入作为第一个参数的操作。Using the method is the same as invoking the method and passing the action as the first parameter.

summary.span: 获取子表的指定操作页的路径。

span.span: Gets the path for the specified action page of the child table.

span.span: The target action.

summary.span: 获取子表的指定操作页的路径。

span.span: Gets the path of the specified action page of the child table.

returns.span: 子表的指定操作页的路径。

span.span: The path of the specified action page of the child table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的子表的指定的操作页路径。The method returns the path of the specified action page for the child table. 返回的路径取决于为 ASP.NET 动态数据应用程序定义的路由，并具有指定的行作为父级。The path returned is based on the routes that are defined for the ASP.NET Dynamic Data application and has the specified row as a parent. 路径通过将查询字符串值追加到包含外键字段值中指定的 URL 获取`row`参数。The path is obtained by appending a query-string value to the URL that contains the foreign-key field value specified in the `row` parameter. 如果`row`是`null`，此方法返回空字符串。If `row` is `null`, his method returns an empty string. 可以使用中定义的值类的`action`参数。You can use the values defined in the class for the `action` parameter.

summary.span: 获取子表的指定操作页的路径。

span.span: Gets the path for the specified action page of the child table.

returns.span: 子表的指定操作页的路径。

span.span: The path of the specified action page of the child table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的子表的指定的操作页路径。The method returns the path of the specified action page for the child table. 该路径基于指定行的指定路径作为父级。The path is based on the specified path with the specified row as a parent. 路径通过将查询字符串值追加到包含外键字段值中指定的 URL 获取`row`参数。The path is obtained by appending a query-string value to the URL that contains the foreign-key field value specified in the `row` parameter. 如果`row`是`null`，此方法返回一个空字符串。If `row` is `null`, this method returns an empty string. 如果`path`是`null`，则方法返回基于为 ASP.NET 动态数据应用程序定义的路由的路径。If `path` is `null`, the method returns the path based on the routes defined for the ASP.NET Dynamic Data application. 可以使用中定义的值类的`action`参数。You can use the values defined in the class for the `action` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能直接调用此方法。This method cannot be called directly. 若要自定义初始化，可以从此类派生并重写`Initialize`方法。To customize initialization, you can derive from this class and override the `Initialize` method. 如果重写此方法，调用基控件的`Initialize`方法。If you override this method, call the base control's `Initialize` method.
